data.trans: Có ý nghĩa quan trọng, có ảnh hưởng
data.trans_hint: Các nhà quản lý đang thảo luận và giải quyết những việc quan trọng nhất đối với nhân viên.
data.en_hint: Managers are discussing and tackling the things that matter most to employees.
data.content_game_1: Managers are discussing and tackling the things that matter most to employees.
data.answer_en_hint: Managers are discussing and tackling the things that matter most to employees.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi không đủ số người tham gia vào buổi họp, vì thế chúng tôi hủy nó.
data.en_hint: We could not get enough people to participate in the meeting, so we canceled it.
data.content_game_1: We could not get enough people to participate in the meeting, so we canceled it.
data.answer_en_hint: We could not get enough people to participate in the meeting, so we canceled it.

data.trans_hint: Người chiến thắng được trao huy chương.
data.en_hint: The winners were presented with medals
data.content_game_1: The winners were presented with medals
data.answer_en_hint: The winners were presented with medals

data.trans_hint: Các nhà quản lý đã có một cuộc họp rất hiệu quả và có thể giải quyết nhiều vấn đề.
data.en_hint: The managers had a very productive meeting and were able to solve many of the problems.
data.content_game_1: The managers had a very productive meeting and were able to solve many of the problems.
data.answer_en_hint: The managers had a very productive meeting and were able to solve many of the problems.

data.trans_hint: Vui lòng chuẩn bị bút và giấy cạnh điện thoại và sẵn sàng ghi lại thông tin liên quan về cuộc họp.
data.en_hint: Please have a pen and paper by the phone and be ready to record the relevant information about the meeting.
data.content_game_1: Please have a pen and paper by the phone and be ready to record the relevant information about the meeting.
data.answer_en_hint: Please have a pen and paper by the phone and be ready to record the relevant information about the meeting.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đã phản hồi lời mời tham dự buổi hội thảo kinh doanh.
data.en_hint: He has responded to the invitation to attend the business workshop.
data.content_game_1: He has responded to the invitation to attend the business workshop.
data.answer_en_hint: He has responded to the invitation to attend the business workshop.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã kiểm tra lịch trình hội nghị dự kiến ​​cho thứ Tư.
data.en_hint: I have checked the tentative conference schedule for Wednesday.
data.content_game_1: I have checked the tentative conference schedule for Wednesday.
data.answer_en_hint: I have checked the tentative conference schedule for Wednesday.

data.trans: Cuối cùng, sau cùng, chính yếu
data.trans_hint: Tất cả mọi thứ cuối cùng sẽ phụ thuộc vào những gì được nói ra tại cuộc họp với các giám đốc vào tuần tới.
data.en_hint: Everything will ultimately depend on what is said at the meeting with the directors next week.
data.content_game_1: Everything will ultimately depend on what is said at the meeting with the directors next week.
data.answer_en_hint: Everything will ultimately depend on what is said at the meeting with the directors next week.

data.trans_hint: Ông Lê đã thông báo với tôi rằng ông đang rút khỏi hội nghị.
data.en_hint: Mr. Le has informed me that he is withdrawing from the conference.
data.content_game_1: Mr. Le has informed me that he is withdrawing from the conference.
data.answer_en_hint: Mr. Le has informed me that he is withdrawing from the conference.

data.trans: Làm cái gì tồi tệ hơn
data.trans_hint: Ý tưởng trong cuộc họp của anh ấy chỉ làm vấn đề tồi tệ hơn.
data.en_hint: His idea in the meeting only worsens the problem.
data.content_game_1: His idea in the meeting only worsens the problem.
data.answer_en_hint: His idea in the meeting only worsens the problem.
